Name: The Tower
About the game: Taking you higher than any theme park dare to take you, this VR coaster will rise up through the tallest skyscraper until you are high over the city before plummeting to the ground as you grip tight for every stomach churning twist and turn. Can you hold your nerve on this exhilarating coaster ride? [This is a 360 render video]
